definition: characteristic of a person who is not cultivated or does not have intellectual tastes, a person who is uninterested in intellectual pursuits
details:
adjective
- characteristic of a person who is not cultivated or does not have intellectual tastes
= example: characteristic of a person who is not cultivated or does not have intellectual tastes
= synonyms: lowbrowed, uncultivated
noun
- a person who is uninterested in intellectual pursuits
= synonyms: anti-intellectual
